explains: n. 伤亡人员；受害者，毁坏物；急诊室，急救室；事故，灾难（主要用于保险中）
wordGroup: casualty insurance 灾害保险；不幸事故保险

sentences.en: There are fears that the casualty toll may be higher.
sentences.cn: 人们担心伤亡人数可能会更多。

sentences.en: Training includes realistic simulation of casualty procedures.
sentences.cn: 训练包括伤亡处理程序的实际模拟。

sentences.en: The victims were rushed to casualty.
sentences.cn: 受伤者被迅速送往急救室。
